Monitor.description: Amazon CloudWatch alarm to monitor during the deployment process.

AlarmArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon CloudWatch alarm.
AlarmArn.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon CloudWatch alarm.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

AlarmRoleArn.description: ARN of an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role for AWS AppConfig to monitor AlarmArn.
AlarmRoleArn.markdownDescription:
ARN of an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role for AWS AppConfig to monitor AlarmArn.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption

Monitor.markdownDescription:
Amazon CloudWatch alarm to monitor during the deployment process.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: Metadata to assign to the environment. Tags help organize and categorize your AWS AppConfig resources. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.

Value.description: The tag value can be up to 256 characters.
Value.markdownDescription:
The tag value can be up to 256 characters.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.description: The key-value string map. The valid character set is [a-zA-Z1-9+-=._:/]. The tag key can be up to 128 characters and must not start with aws:.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key-value string map. The valid character set is [a-zA-Z1-9+-=._:/]. The tag key can be up to 128 characters and must not start with aws:.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
Metadata to assign to the environment. Tags help organize and categorize your AWS AppConfig resources. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentId.markdownDescription:
The environment ID.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-z0-9]{4,7}  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Description.markdownDescription:
A description of the environment.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

Monitors.description: Amazon CloudWatch alarms to monitor during the deployment process.
Monitors.markdownDescription:
Amazon CloudWatch alarms to monitor during the deployment process.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

DeletionProtectionCheck.description: On resource deletion this controls whether the Deletion Protection check should be applied, bypassed, or (the default) whether the behavior should be controlled by the account-level Deletion Protection setting. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/appconfig/latest/userguide/deletion-protection.html
DeletionProtectionCheck.markdownDescription:
On resource deletion this controls whether the Deletion Protection check should be applied, bypassed, or (the default) whether the behavior should be controlled by the account-level Deletion Protection setting. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/appconfig/latest/userguide/deletion-protection.html

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACCOUNT_DEFAULT | APPLY | BYPASS  
Update requires: No interruption

ApplicationId.markdownDescription:
The application ID.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-z0-9]{4,7}  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: Metadata to assign to the environment. Tags help organize and categorize your AWS AppConfig resources. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.
Tags.markdownDescription:
Metadata to assign to the environment. Tags help organize and categorize your AWS AppConfig resources. Each tag consists of a key and an optional value, both of which you define.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
A name for the environment.
